snippet: Now on the same scale as gas- or coal-fired power stations, wind farms have grown large offshore. Though costs are slowly decreasing, the industry still has a long way to go to become competitive.
lead_paragraph: Now on the same scale as gas- or coal-fired power stations, wind farms have grown large offshore. Though costs are slowly decreasing, the industry still has a long way to go to become competitive.

headline.print_headline: Wind Farms Take Root Out at Sea
headline.main: Wind Farms Take Root Out at Sea
